metadata.title: CVE-2021-47407 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  KVM: x86: Handle SRCU initialization failure during page track init  Check the return of init_srcu_struct(), which can fail due to OOM, when initializing the page track mechanism.  Lack of checking leads to a NULL pointer deref found by a modified syzkaller.  [Move the call towards the beginning of kvm_arch_init_vm. - Paolo]
